abstract: Charter Communications has suspended its plan to sell information about its customers’ Web surfing to an advertising company.
snippet: Charter Communications has suspended its plan to sell information about its customers’ Web surfing to an advertising company.
lead_paragraph: Charter Communications, the big cable company, said Tuesday that it is suspending its plan to sell data about its customers’ Web surfing to an advertising company.

headline.main: Charter Suspends Plan to Sell Customer Data to Advertisers
